department: Department of Computer Science and Engineering
name: COL777 Deep Reinforcement Learning
description: Introduction and Basics of RL, Markov Decision Processes (MDPs), Dynamic Programming, Monte Carlo Methods (Prediction), Temporal difference Methods (Prediction), Monte Carlo, TD Method (Control), N-step TD, Eligibility Traces, Model based RL, (Action-)Value Function Approximation, Value Function Approximation, Policy Gradient, Policy Gradient, Recent Applications, Misc./Advanced Topics.
